sections.content: How Do You Effectively Manage Your Socials as a Brand?
Social media is powerful, but it can also be overwhelming.

items: Responding to comments and DMs across multiple platforms
Keeping your messaging and branding aligned
Collaborating across teams (marketing, legal, design, leadership)
Monitoring alerts, mentions, and complaints in real time
Ensuring every platform gets equal attention

sections.alt: Managing multiple social media platforms can be overwhelming
sections.caption: The reality of managing social media across multiple platforms

sections.content: Most companies have **teams**, not individuals, managing their social presence. Even smaller companies often designate someone familiar with social platforms to manage it alongside their main responsibilities.
When a brand is active on multiple platforms (TikTok, Instagram, X, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn), the work multiplies quickly.
A **social media management tool**, such as **Zoho Social**.
Instead of juggling multiple apps, brands can control everything from one place.

items: What are other ways brands engage with customers on social media? Do you have an example of a brand you like to follow because of how they interact?
